attributes.action: demand on bahalf of all cyclists that comprehensive and safe cycle lanes be built in the Greater London area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are currently very few connecting and efficient cycle lanes in the greater London area. Everyone is being charged for driving in London however those of us who wish to travel in a more environmentally friendly fashion risk our lives due to the lack of bicycle lanes. Its healthy for us and healthier for everyone living in the city for more of its residents to use bicycles as transport.
All other western cities have better and safer lanes-WHY NOT LONDON?
